object.name: setChatAdministratorCustomTitle
object.description: Use this method to set a custom title for an administrator in a supergroup promoted by the bot. Returns True on success.
object.html_description: Use this method to set a custom title for an administrator in a supergroup promoted by the bot. Returns True on success.
object.rst_description: Use this method to set a custom title for an administrator in a supergroup promoted by the bot. Returns :code:`True` on success.

annotations.description: Unique identifier for the target chat or username of the target supergroup (in the format @supergroupusername)
annotations.html_description: Unique identifier for the target chat or username of the target supergroup (in the format @supergroupusername)
annotations.rst_description: Unique identifier for the target chat or username of the target supergroup (in the format :code:`@supergroupusername`)
annotations.name: chat_id

annotations.description: Unique identifier of the target user
annotations.rst_description: Unique identifier of the target user
annotations.name: user_id

annotations.description: New custom title for the administrator; 0-16 characters, emoji are not allowed
annotations.html_description: New custom title for the administrator; 0-16 characters, emoji are not allowed
annotations.rst_description: New custom title for the administrator; 0-16 characters, emoji are not allowed
annotations.name: custom_title
